name: get_translation_nllb
description: This tool allows you to translate a given text from one language to another using NLLB model.

input_text.description: The text or a list of texts you would like to translate.

tgt_lang.description: The target language. It should be a string representing the language code, such as 'eng_Latn', 'zho_Hans', 'jpn_Jpan', 'kor_Hang', 'dan_Latn' and so on.

src_lang.description: The source language. It should be a string representing the language code, such as 'eng_Latn', 'zho_Hans', 'jpn_Jpan', 'kor_Hang', 'dan_Latn' and so on.

max_length.description: The maximum length of the translated text.

name: get_translation_baidu
description: This tool allows you to translate a given text from one language to another using BAIDU translate api.

text.description: The given text you would like to translate.

tgt_lang.description: The target language. It should be a string representing the language code, such as 'en', 'zh', 'jp', 'kor', 'dan' and so on.

appid.description: The appid for using BAIDU translate api.

secret_key.description: The secret key for using BAIDU translate api.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
